scripts.publish:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && npm run build:prod && cd dist/@jamesbenrobb/ts-ast-parser/src && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm run build:prod && npm run cd:dist && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm run build:prod && npm run cd:dist && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm run build:prod && npm run cd:dist && npm publish --tag latest
